title: Skyforge
body:
Looked like an interesting game. So I decided to play it.

Then...

I found yasuo.

(the mmorpg skyforge)

Edit: ... is riot working with this game? found garen aswell.

replies.body: the mmorpg, yasuo is in it.

I originally thought you were talking about this:
http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111231025828/elderscrolls/images/6/62/Eorlund_skyforge.png

But anyways Skyrim is imo a garbage game if you're not someone who just plays video games solely as time wasters.

__________
_________

Skyforge the game looks okay I guess, I am not super keen myself.
